00025 /* Power assignments */
00026 #define MOTOR_POWER_FAST      75
00027 #define MOTOR_POWER_MODERATE  75
00028 #define MOTOR_POWER_SLOW      30
00029 
00030 /* Motor assignments */
00031 #define MOTOR_TILT       OUT_C
00032 #define MOTOR_STRIDE     OUT_B
00033 
00034 /* Sensor assignments */
00035 #define TOUCH_SENSOR     IN_1
00036 #define LIGHT_SENSOR     IN_3
00037 
00038 /* Light sensor threshold below which proximity is confirmed */
00039 #define LIGHT_SENSOR_PROXIMITY_THRESHOLD 40
00040 
00041 /* Tolerance degrees for cycle caliberation. Cycle count will be trimmed */
00042 #define CALIBERATION_ERROR_TOLERANCE     90
00043 
00044 int GetSensorProximity (int sensor)
00045 {
00046     if (sensor == TOUCH_SENSOR)
00047        return Sensor(TOUCH_SENSOR);
00048     if (Sensor(LIGHT_SENSOR) < LIGHT_SENSOR_PROXIMITY_THRESHOLD)
00049        return 1;
00050     else
00051        return 0;
00052 }
00053 
00054 int CaliberateMotorArc(int motor, int power, int sensor,
00055                        int postAlignmentAngle)
00056 {
00057     if (!GetSensorProximity(sensor))
00058     {
00059         OnFwd(motor, power);
00060         while (!GetSensorProximity(sensor)) Wait(20);
00061         Off(motor);
00062     }
00063     RotateMotor(motor, power, postAlignmentAngle);
00064 }
00065 
00075 int CaliberateMotor(int motor, int sensor, int postAlignmentPercentage)
00076 {
00077     int extremeTachoMin;
00078     int extremeTachoMax;
00079     int cycleCountMin;
00080     int cycleCountMax;
00081     int cycleCount;
00082     int alignDegrees;
00083 
00084     /* Start tilt motor and monitor touch sensor for rythm cycle */
00085     OnFwd(motor, MOTOR_POWER_FAST);
00086 
00087     /* First let the sensor get out of active state */
00088     while (GetSensorProximity(sensor));
00089 
00090     /* Wait for sensor to activate */
00091     while (!GetSensorProximity(sensor));
00092 
00093     /* Start both extreme count and cycle count */
00094     extremeTachoMin = GetOutput(motor, TachoCount);
00095     cycleCountMin = extremeTachoMin;
00096 
00097     /* Wait for sensor to deactivate */
00098     while (GetSensorProximity(sensor));
00099 
00100     /* end count */
00101     extremeTachoMax = GetOutput(motor, TachoCount);
00102 
00103     /* Wait for sensor to activate again */
00104     while (!GetSensorProximity(sensor));
00105 
00106     /* End cycle count */
00107     cycleCountMax = GetOutput(motor, TachoCount);
00108 
00109     /* Stop the motor */
00110     Off(motor);
00111 
00112     /* Correct any error within cycle count */
00113     cycleCount = cycleCountMax - cycleCountMin;
00114     int errorCycleCount = cycleCount % CALIBERATION_ERROR_TOLERANCE;
00115     if (errorCycleCount < CALIBERATION_ERROR_TOLERANCE/2)
00116        cycleCount -= errorCycleCount;
00117     else
00118        cycleCount += CALIBERATION_ERROR_TOLERANCE - errorCycleCount;
00119 
00120     /* Align the moter to neutral */
00121     /* Move the tacho limit to neutralAlignment + 1/2 extreme sensor period */
00122     alignDegrees = (cycleCount * postAlignmentPercentage)/100 +
00123                     (extremeTachoMax - extremeTachoMin)/2;
00124     RotateMotor(motor, MOTOR_POWER_FAST, alignDegrees);
00125 
00126     return cycleCount;
00127 }
00128 
00129 #if 0
00130 task main ()
00131 {
00132      int tiltCycleCount, strideCycleCount;
00133      int currentPositionTilt = 0, currentPositionStride = 0;
00134 
00135      SetSensorTouch(TOUCH_SENSOR);
00136      SetSensorLight(LIGHT_SENSOR);
00137 
00138      tiltCycleCount = CaliberateMotor(MOTOR_TILT, TOUCH_SENSOR, 0);
00139      TextOut(0, LCD_LINE1, NumToStr(tiltCycleCount), true);
00140 
00141      strideCycleCount = CaliberateMotor(MOTOR_STRIDE, LIGHT_SENSOR, 0);
00142      TextOut(0, LCD_LINE2, NumToStr(strideCycleCount), false);
00143      
00144      RotateMotor(MOTOR_STRIDE, MOTOR_POWER_FAST, strideCycleCount/8);
00145      RotateMotor(MOTOR_TILT, MOTOR_POWER_FAST, tiltCycleCount/4);
00146 }
00147 #endif
